name: Mirrorball: Sumo Battle
description:
Submitted to the NotMyNES Jam.

web version doesnt work, please try the windows version, sorry guys

all assets are mine

made in unity

use a and d keys to move left and right, space is for bouncing down.

push or trick the enemy mirror ball into the spikes while avoiding going into them yourself.

every difficulty level has a different layout. do you have what it takes to beat hardcore mode...?

have fun!
